page.title: 11HOTHFIELD (1)
page.content:
Within this square is the major part of the village of{Hothfield,}most of the houses are Local Authority owned and were built in the period between the wars.
The centre of the village is some distance from{Hothfield Church,}about half a mile.
{Hothfield}acts as a dormitory area for nearby Ashford where most of those in employment have work.
The village of{Hothfield}is served by a Public House, a Post Office/Store, a General Store, a Police House and a Village Hall.
{Hothfield}is the largest centre of population for this block of squares.
